docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair|Scalar|Vector
    the DataContainer to be visualized
docstring.short_description: Generate a Plotly figure, displaying a big number with an optional prefix and suffix.

parameters.name: relative_delta
parameters.description: whether or not to show the relative delta from the last run along with big number

parameters.name: suffix
parameters.description: any suffix to show with big number

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: any prefix to show with big number

returns.description: the DataContainer containing the Plotly big number visualization
